info.name: Eladrin
info.description: Subrace from the Dungeon Master’s Guide".
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Creatures of magic with strong ties to nature, eladrin live in the twilight realm of the Feywild. Their cities sometimes cross over to the Material Plane, appearing briefly in mountain valleys or deep forest glades before fading back into the Feywild.

Ability Score Increase.Your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Elf Weapon Training.You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
Fey Step.You can cast the misty step spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.
